AVPpBA.en:
[Lilla]
Hmm, are you sure you should be fighting here?
These monsters seem tough for someone of your level.
AVPpBA.pt:
[Lilla]
Hmm, are you sure you should be fighting here?
These monsters seem tough for someone of your level.

AlPpBA.en:
[Lilla]
Why hello!
You look like someone who is willing to help a 'lil thing like myself out.
AlPpBA.pt:
[Lilla]
Why hello!
You look like someone who is willing to help a 'lil thing like myself out.

BVPpBA.en:
[Lilla]
Those Dryads have been ruining all of the beautiful plants that I have been trying to raise.
Can you help me get rid of 'em?
BVPpBA.pt:
[Lilla]
Those Dryads have been ruining all of the beautiful plants that I have been trying to raise.
Can you help me get rid of 'em?

CFPpBA.en:
[Lilla]
Thank you.
How many would you like to hunt?
CFPpBA.pt:
[Lilla]
Thank you.
How many would you like to hunt?
